location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.3225 of 1853 from Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary of the Government, Bombay, to Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is a covering letter, enclosing letter no.2921 from W. Seton Karr, Officiating Under Secretary to the Government of India, to Malet, dated 29 June 1853 (folio 105). Seton-Karr's letter instructs Malet to inform the Resident that the underwriters of the Centaurhave instructed Messers Remington & Co. of Bombay to depute a qualified agent, or to appoint a local agent, to look after their interests at Bushire.
